does  not  set  race  apart  from  all  other  weighted  con-
siderations. Nonminority students may receive 20 points for athletic ability,
socioeconomic disadvantage, attendance at a socioeconomically disadvan-
taged or predominantly minority high school, or at the Provost’s discretion;
they  may  also  receive  10  points  for  being  residents  of  Michigan,  6  for
residence  in  an  underrepresented  Michigan  county,  5  for  leadership  and
service, and so on.
